definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
to compute on the abacus/(fig.) to calculate/to plan/to scheme

sentences.english: Sara is asking Yang Pei about her future plans.
sentences.chinese: 薩拉正在問楊佩關於未來的打算。

sentences.english: That's a long way off but it's not too early to make plans.
sentences.chinese: 儘管來日方長，但是及早打算總沒錯。

sentences.english: Flap Horton: Does this mean you won't be knitting the baby any booties?
sentences.chinese: 這不會是意味着你不打算給嬰兒做任何衣服？

sentences.english: Is Japan Planning to Create an Anti-China"Asian NATO"?
sentences.chinese: 日本打算建立一個反中國的“亞洲北約”嗎？

sentences.english: When you were looking for a car, how important was an international brand to you?
sentences.chinese: 當你打算買車的時候，國際品牌對你來說有多重要？

sentences.english: That is it. So you want high temperature bricks, what are you going to make them out of?
sentences.chinese: 這就是它，因此你想要高溫磚，你打算怎麼做它？

sentences.english: Captain Harville had taken his present house for half a year;
sentences.chinese: 哈維爾上校租下現在這幢房子，打算居住半年。

sentences.english: Which would have a bunch of operations, like, I won't go into what they might be.
sentences.chinese: 他們會有一些這樣那樣的操作，我不打算細講。

sentences.english: What do you plan to do after you finish this study program?
sentences.chinese: 此次學習結束後你有何打算或計劃？

sentences.english: Mr. Kamkar, however, said he did not create it to violate anyone’s privacy.
sentences.chinese: 但是Kamkar表示他沒有打算侵犯任何人的隱私。

sentences.english: Certainly, the government itself is not about to start making a fetish of frugality.
sentences.chinese: 當然政府自身不打算做艱苦樸素的榜樣。

sentences.english: We are going to pick apples next week.
sentences.chinese: 下星期我們打算去摘蘋果。

sentences.english: Mr Earnshaw has a mind to shoot you, if you persist in endeavouring to enter.''
sentences.chinese: ‘如果你堅持要進來，恩蕭先生打算拿槍崩你。’

sentences.english: If you plan on not attending class, make sure you have a buddy that will sign u in.
sentences.chinese: 要是你打算蹺課，先保證有個傢夥能幫你簽到。

sentences.english: He decided to grow cotton in his field next year.
sentences.chinese: 他打算明年在自己的地畝上種棉花。

definition: preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be determined to/to insist on
